Key Match Events: Lonzo Ball blocked Timberwolves star Julius Randle's layup
Post-Match Reflections: Bulls coach Billy Donovan announced that Ball would not play in back-to-back regular season games and would be monitored for minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lonzo Ball had a rousing return after being out for more than 1,000 days due to knee injuries
The Chicago Bulls eased Lonzo Ball back into action, playing him 15 minutes in his first game since 2022
